src:
Politiet reagerer etter at bilister advarte mot kontroll
01 Nov 2019, 19:26 by Karoline Ulvnes
Til sammen åtte personer fikk forelegg etter flere UP-kontroller i Trøndelag fredag.
Fredag formiddag hadde Utrykningspolitiet (UP) i Trøndelag flere kontroller. Én av dem ble holdt på Berkåk, hvor resultatet ble fem forenklede forelegg:
text:
Police respond after motorists warned against checking
01 Nov 2019, 19:26 by Karoline Ulvnes
A total of eight people received submissions following several UP inspections in Trøndelag on Friday.
On Friday morning, the Uprising Police (UP) in Trøndelag had several checks. One of them was held in Berkåk, where the results were five simplified submissions:
